page-home.header-text: tones for the Oklab Color Space

page-about.p-01: OklabTones â€“ a tone palette for Material Design 3.
page-about.p-02: The user selects a color. The palette's tonal rows are generated based on the selected color:
page-about.li-06-add: it does not depend on the selected color
page-about.p-03: The file with the palette colors can be saved to your local disk.
page-about.p-04-3: webpage, colors of the palette are given in the HEX format or the HCT color space.
page-about.p-05: The palette exports colors in the RGB and the Oklch format. This simplifies the color transparency setting in the CSS style files.
page-about.p-06: At first, the palette was supposed to be generated only based on the Oklab color space. Unfortunately, lightness fluctuates with the changes in chromaticity or tone.
page-about.p-07: The creation of the palette requires independence of tone, chromaticity and lightness from each other. To do this, their values are compared with values in other color spaces:
page-about.p-hue-2: with tone in the IPT color space
page-about.p-chroma-2: with chroma in the CAM16 color space
page-about.p-lightn-2: with lightness in the Lab color space
